alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:33PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Idaho, south central Missoula, southwestern Granite and northern Ravalli Counties through 415 PM MDT/315 PM PDT/... At 333 PM MDT/233 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles northwest of Victor to 17 miles northeast of Conner. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Lolo, Stevensville, Victor, Florence, Woodside, Pinesdale, Bell Crossing, Skalkaho Pass, and Corvallis. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 46 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys
